changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USERS ( ID BIGSERIAL NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PASSWORD VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, BIRTH_DATE DATE, ROLE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL CHECK (ROLE IN ('ADMIN', 'CLIENT')), CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATED_AT TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (ID) );
